NK040(thi)018:2: spyi bo'i ma cig las mkha' 'gro sde lnga dang /
NK040(thi)018:3: yang sprul mkha' 'gro 'bum spros pa las 'od zer
NK040(thi)018:4: kha dog sna tshogs byung nas rang la thim pas
NK040(thi)018:5: yang dag bde chen ye shes skyes par bsam nas
NK040(thi)018:7: ma yum chen sku yi sprul pa'i sras //
NK040(thi)018:8: dbus phyogs sangs rgyas rigs kyi d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:9: yang dag bde chen spyod pa'i d+aak+ki ma //
NK040(thi)018:10: dad mos drag po'i stobs kyis gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)018:11: thugs rje dbri bkol med par dgongs mdzod la //
NK040(thi)018:12: dad ldan skyes bu rnams la bcud du phob //
NK040(thi)018:13: las can pho mo byin gyis rlabs du gsol //
NK040(thi)018:14: ma yum chen thugs kyi sprul pa'i sras //
NK040(thi)018:15: shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:17: ma yum chen yon tan sprul pa'i sras //
NK040(thi)018:18: lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:20: ma yum chen gsung gi sprul pa'i sras //
NK040(thi)018:21: nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:23: ma yum chen phrin las sprul pa'i sras //
NK040(thi)018:24: byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:26: ma g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhengs pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:29: ma yi gri gug thod khrag thugs kar 'dzin pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:30: rnam rtog rtsad nas gcod pa'i d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:32: ma yi thod kam lnga yi dbu la brgyan pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:33: yon tan thams cad rgyas pa'i d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:35: ma yi mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal byas pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:36: 'khrul pa'i bdud sde zad pa'i d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:38: ma yi rus pa'i rgyan drug sku la brgyan pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:39: pha rol phyin drug rdzogs pa'i d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:40: yang dag ma yi klu chen brgyad kyi sku la brgyan pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:41: gdug rtsub zhe sdang zhi ba'i d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:43: ma yi kha t+w+aam rtse gsum mchan du bcug pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:44: dug gsum rtsad nas gcod pa'i d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:46: ma yi mi mgo sum brtsegs rab tu brgyan pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:47: srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:49: ma yi d+aa ru cang te gser gyi rnga chung la //
NK040(thi)018:50: don dam snyan brgyud 'dzin pa'i yang dag sogs /
NK040(thi)018:51: ma yi dril bu g.yer kha'i gsung snyan sgrogs pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:52: stong gsum chos sgras gang ba'i yang dag sogs /
NK040(thi)018:53: ma yis mi rkang gling bu'i bzhad gad ston pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:54: mkha' 'gro'i brda skad ston pa'i d+aak+ki 'bum //
NK040(thi)018:56: ma yi dar gyi 'phur lces rab tu brgyan pa ni //
NK040(thi)018:58: yang dag bde chen spyod pa'i d+aak+ki ma //
NK040(thi)018:59: dad mos drag po'i stobs kyi gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)018:60: thugs rje bri bskol med par dgongs mdzod la //
NK040(thi)018:61: dad ldan skyes bu rnams la bcud du phob //
NK040(thi)018:62: las can pho mo byin gyis brlabs tu gsol //
NK040(thi)018:63: ces ma cig gis gsungs pa'i d+aak+ki 'bum bskul rdzogs so ////
